properties.name: db.hcat.driver
properties.description: Driver for the connection to the hive database.

properties.name: db.hcat.sql.dialect
properties.description: Dialect used for statements against the hive database.

properties.name: db.hcat.sql.validation-query
properties.description: Validation query used to check if a connection to the hive database is still valid.

properties.name: db.hcat.url
properties.description: The url to the hive database.

properties.name: db.hcat.username
properties.description: The username for the hive database.

properties.name: db.hcat.password
properties.description: The password for the hive database.
